title: Updates to "Brush Script Faces ala Veer, SpeakUp, Bello"
content:
I’m looking for an expressive, almost athletic script along the lines of Bello and found this thread:

Brush Script Faces ala Veer, SpeakUp, Bello  
 [http://typophile.com/node/15395](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/typophile.com/node/15395 "http://typophile.com/node/15395")

Lots of good suggestions, but I noticed it’s over a year old. Does anyone have any updated suggestions or new releases to add?

.s

 [‹ Roman Numeral Dilemma](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31167 "Go to previous forum topic") [Free Fonts from Apple... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/www.typophile.com/node/31016 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Spencer Cross

comments.content:
I can actually add one myself...

Kari by Positype  
 [http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000177](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000177 "http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000177")

Very “Athletic”:  
 [Metroscript](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=ALSO-MESR)  
 [Red Sable](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/letterheadfonts.com/fonts/redsablescript.shtml)

Also consider:  
 [Galaxie Cassiopeia](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/vllg.com/Village/GalaxieCassiopeia/mudTyper+Weights/)

Coming Soon:  
 [Suomi Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/www.type.fi/SuomiNext.html)

and hopefully [Underware](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Underware) will release their Typeradio script sometime soon.

Mark Simonson has some scripts listed in the [Indie Fonts 3](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Indie%252BFonts) book, but i can’t find them on the [Font Bros](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Font%252BBros) site. Stuart?

Here’s a link to a preview of Mark Simonson’s new scripts:

[http://www.marksimonson.com/article/170/coming-soon-three-new-fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/www.marksimonson.com/article/170/coming-soon-three-new-fonts "http://www.marksimonson.com/article/170/coming-soon-three-new-fonts")

Jakkal  
We have added some new [scripts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/www.sudtipos.com/home) since the last year thread. And we changed the site to make visitor’s life more easy :)
Ale we bought _Affair_ a couple of weeks ago. Beautiful stuff.

Thanks, all, for the input so far. Very useful (and beautiful) recommendations!

—  
_Spencer Cross_  
[professional] [http://tokyofarm.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/tokyofarm.com/)  
[personal] [http://fivethousand.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/fivethousand.net/)  
[communal] [http://kernspiracy.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/kernspiracy.com/)  
[cultural] [http://blogging.la](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324020205/http:/blogging.la/)
Conor: Thank you very much, will be able in the future to send me some jpg with Affair in use? I ll appreciate that very much. :)
